document.full_text: thousands took to the streets of hama, the site of a government massacre in the 1980s, to honor at least 65 protesters killed by security forces the day before.
document.title: syrian tanks move in on city as thousands mourn protesters' deaths
lines_and_colors: thousands took to the streets of hama, the site of a government massacre in the 1980s, to honor at least 65 protesters killed by security forces the day before.
